articles.title: Renewable Energy Surpasses Coal in Historic Global Power Shift
articles.summary: **Renewable energy** has overtaken **coal** as the world's primary electricity source in the first half of 2025. The growth in **solar** and **wind** power met all additional electricity demand, marking a significant milestone in global energy transition.

articles.summary: Researchers at the **University of Arizona** have successfully captured quantum uncertainty in real-time using **femtosecond light pulses**. The breakthrough study, led by **Mohammed Hassan**, provides unprecedented insight into fundamental quantum mechanics.
